Notes

  • This meeting will be a general orientated meeting. So everybody be there.
  • Meeting will start at 20:00 CEST (18:00 GMT, 11:00 PDT)

Agenda

Major points

  • Long term goals
  • Short term goals including making Trac tickets for them.
  • Release cycle and release manager.
  • Starters guides for new developers (All areas including: code, art, settings, etc).
  • Open discussion
  • Discuss the things below

Things to discuss

  • General things
